search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Showcase IDX (showcase-idx.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Showcase IDX is [https://showcaseidx.com/pricing/](https://showcaseidx.com/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:

Join 1000s of the country’s top agents using Showcase IDX to improve their website and their business

Most Popular

Frequently Asked Questions

Access, transparency, and help. We love to talk on the phone, and you’re always welcome to call or schedule time. We also have chat feature to assist you when you’re in your dashboard.

Most people want to be superheroes. We strive to be the sidekicks that help them – both our clients and our teammates. Don’t take our word for it. **[Read what other agents say about our support here](https://showcaseidx.com/idx-reviews/)**.

**Want to know more about our team culture and approach to helping you? Read about [our “culture” and “core values”](https://showcaseidx.com/about-us/)** – we live them and you can always remind us of them. We want to not just help you today but also build momentum for tomorrow.

We accept payments made online using Visa, Mastercard, Discover, and American Express. We cannot accept any personal or business checks.

We only charge for service in USD (United States Dollar). For customers in Canada, please note that you will see a charge on your method of payment for more than the cost of the IDX on our website due to the exchange rate at the given time.

You can use Showcase IDX absolutely free for 10 days once we get your MLS paperwork approved from the MLS and send you everything you need to get started. That way you can experience the full IDX and home search tools with live MLS data.

Prior to that, you can begin using the IDX plugin with demo data.

We don’t ask that you give us a credit card until you’re ready to commit to activating your account past your trial period.

You have a full 10-days from the start of your trial to use all the premium features of Showcase IDX. We even cover all your MLS pass-through fees for the 10 days and there are **no setup fees whatsoever**.

There are no setup fees or long-term contracts with Showcase IDX.

We win your business with value and support, not long-term contracts or steep upfront payments.

**Monthly** Plans  
No. There is no set-term contract when you use Showcase IDX on a monthly plan, other than agreeing to our Terms of Service. You can cancel your account at any time and you will not be billed again. To cancel your account, send us an email and we’ll take care of it.

Yearly Plans  
When you sign up for a yearly plan, you are committing to that plan Showcase IDX for 12 months and **you receive 12 months for the price of 10 months**. The level (Essentials or Premium) of the yearly plan cannot be switched during this term. If you choose to cancel before the end of your 12-month-term, we will refund a prorated amount representing the remainder of your 12-month-term, along with an early cancelation fee of $200 taken out of the prorated refund amount.

More and more MLS’s require vendors like us to pay Data Access Fees that are passed through to the customer (you). These vary from $0/month up to $33/month. If we don’t have to charge a pass-through fee, we don’t. For the MLS you select, this will be clearly displayed on your sign up form, before you complete your sign up process. Although the rates may vary slightly, 99% of IDX companies charge these fees.

You can also see these on our MLS Coverage page.

Yes. You can purchase a license for additional sites and add additional users.

Our Essentials plan includes 2 admin users and your Premium plan includes 5. It’s also easy to add additional sites. If you’re a broker or have a team and would like to provide a website for each member on your team, we can help you with that as well.

The Essentials plan includes 2 users. Additional users are:

*   3-10 Users: $4/mo/user
*   11-50 Users: $3/mo/user
*   51-100 Users: $2.50/mo/user
*   100-200 Users: $2.25/mo/user
*   200+ Users: $2/mo/user

The Premium plan include 5 users. Additional users are:

*   6-10 Users: $4/mo/user
*   11-50 Users: $3/mo/user
*   51-100 Users: $2.50/mo/user
*   100-200 Users: $2.25/mo/user
*   200+ Users: $2/mo/user

**Showcase IDX was founded in 2003.** Since then, we’ve closed a private equity round and grown our team. Now, we’re the leading IDX WordPress plugin for real estate and are growing faster than ever. We democratize technology for agents and brokers, creating innovative products that empower our customers to grow.

If you want to know more about our team, where we’re based, or why we love coming to work, you can [read more here](https://showcaseidx.com/about-us/).

Great question. Many of the agents and brokers that work with us do have web designer/developer already or are setting up their website themselves.

If you’re familiar with WordPress and how to update a theme, you can easily get started today.

**We also see many agents and brokers that know that having the right IDX technology is critical to building your business and helping your clients. They often sign up first on our website and then contact one of our Showcase [IDX Certified Partners](https://showcaseidx.com/agencies/)** for help building their site and setting up modern real estate marketing processes. We also have a few partners that work specifically with websites on our [approved real estate web designers](https://showcaseidx.com/custom-wordpress-real-estate-websites/) list.

If you’d like to sign up, you can set up time with our concierge team too and they can recommend a developer while you’re MLS approval is processed. Either way, you’re trial will not start until your MLS access is approved.

We do NOT build websites, instead we build the engines that power your website. This lets us focus on building the ONLY IDX and home search that consumers choose over Zillow.

If you need help building your website or customizing your existing website, talk to one of our [Showcase IDX Certified Partners](https://showcaseidx.com/agencies/). These partners are the best of the best. They know modern real estate marketing. **Each certified partner page shows you exactly what each partner specializes in and the budgets they help with**.

**For web developers,** know that we will not compete with you either. Other IDX vendors have begun building websites that compete with their partners. So, not only do they use subdomains and iFrames, which Google hates, but now they compete with their partners.

Yes.

You can opt into a yearly plan at a 2 month discount.

The Essentials plan is $849.50/year ($169 savings)

The Premium plan is $1195/year ($244 savings)

*   **Absolutely**. We integrate deeply with WordPress on your site to create [100% search engine indexable content](https://showcaseidx.com/real-estate-listing-pages/). Our IDX WordPress plugin turns your website and marketing into a living platform, with drip emails to clients with new listings, continually updated hotsheets and detailed listing pages. **Here is a [SEO case study](https://showcaseidx.com/real-estate-seo-case-study/) walking you through both how to build your real estate website to rank and what is possible.**
    
    **Showcase IDX NEVER uses a subdomain** (e.g. search.yourwebsite.com) or iframe. Google doesn’t like them and neither do we. [Learn more in this 3-minute video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q9b9YEBSlJ8).
    

Our customers and the data says so. **[Don’t just take our word. See what real estate agents and top marketers say about us.](https://showcaseidx.com/idx-reviews)**

*   Buyers and sellers spent more than 29,400,000 minutes on our customer’s websites last year. **That’s like watching Avengers Endgame over 161,000+ times.**
*   Our customers see 83% additional traffic from Google (on average) and an increase in lead generation that gets better as they’re able to focus on content and their business while we focus on providing your search and engagement tools.
*   “Showcase IDX retains 8.5x more clients than IDX Broker and 4x more clients than the typical iHomeFinder website”. [Learn more here.](https://www.themadeinamericamovement.com/idx-report-and-reviews/)

Some MLS® systems offer a free or inexpensive search program but most agents quickly find ou these solutions are not built for modern marketing or lead capture. **The MLS systems are great at delivering data but not making that data friendly to consumers. We are great at making real estate data is useful and creating effective engagement tools for agents and brokers to help clients.**

See more about our portal-quality property search, stunning listing pages, and CRM tools on our product pages. Or sign up for a free no-risk trial and see for yourself.

Feel confident knowing that **our core technology is built on the cloud platform that powers Google, Spotify, and Paypal, with 100k miles of fiber optic cable powering your IDX solution**. Our maps are the fastest maps available, sharing the same platform as Facebook, The Weather Company, Adobe, Snap, and Mastercard.

No, absolutely not.

We take site speed very seriously (in fact, we rarely ever shut up about it) and we created this plugin with performance in mind.

Feel confident knowing that we’re built on the cloud platform that powers Google, Spotify, and Paypal, with 100k miles of fiber optic cable powering your IDX solution.

We also optimized all the code for the fastest possible loading times and can recommend a few great hosting companies if you need a recommendation that won’t break the bank.

No, unfortunately not. It’s almost impossible to rank a real estate site that is NOT built on WordPress.org (self-hosted or hosted through a Certified Partner). Watch [this video to learn more](https://showcaseidx.com/common-real-estate-website-mistakes-how-to-fix-them/).

The solutions that currently work on Wix, Squarespace and WordPress.com are all iframe or subdomain based products. We hear that generating consistent new leads from those current add-on options can be hard.

We’ve invested heavily in creating tools optimized for self-hosted WordPress sites. We hope to be able to partner with these additional partner with some of these platforms for a similar experience in the future. For now, we suggest choosing WordPress self-hosted.

Websites built on WordPress + Showcase IDX generate 83% additional traffic from Google. Start your trial to get the engine powering the most successful sites.

If you need to know more about the difference between WordPress.org and WordPress.com, this is a [good overview](https://wordpress.org/support/article/wordpress-vs-wordpress-com/).

Don’t worry, it will be easy to get started, and we’ll be here to help.

**Step 1 – Paperless MLS documentation.**

You will receive an email shortly with links to the e-documents for the MLS’s you belong to. We will review your application and ensure compliance with the MLS. This typically can take anywhere from the same day to 5 business days depending on the MLS and how fast we get the signed documentation back from you. Please be sure to read and review your documentation (in some cases it has additional instructions which you must complete separately).

**Step 2 – MLS Approval.**

Once you’ve been approved by the MLS, we’ll send you your personal IDX key and installation instructions. You will need your personal IDX key to make your Showcase IDX search work on your site.

**Step 3 – Installation**

We’ve made it as easy as possible to install the plugin on your site, so just follow the written-for-Realtors instructions and you should be good! If you have any issues, email us or call us at 1-800-478-0181.

Unlike other plugins, you don’t need to be a rocket scientist to configure ours.

You can use real-time Showcase IDX lead data to capture and distribute contact information without having to manually add it, trigger marketing automations, and keep close track of their activity on your website.

Our CRM Tools often work for individual agents and small team. However, we know that a CRM focused tool can benefit your business too. No worries. We have several that we love working with.

Key integrations include LionDesk, and Follow Up Boss. We also work with 1000s of apps [through Zapier](https://showcaseidx.com/ultimate-idx-zapier-integration-guide/) to automate your work and find productivity superpowers.

Our exclusive IDX engine contains more than 2,000,000 active real estate listings and 22,800,000 images. It is continually updating new listings and images. Behind the scenes, it’s working for you, to update 110,000 listings and 152,000 images per hour to send new MLS listings to the IDX search pages on your site for some MLSs in as little as 10-15 minutes, so you can be confident that your clients and website visitors will see the most up-to-date listings, images, and information

We also offer you additional data that helps your clients find the home they’re looking for, such as neighborhood & commute information, population information (total area population, age breakdowns, education levels, marital status, number of households with children, etc.), employment information, and more.

Yes and no. Fundamentally, Showcase IDX is a SaaS (software as a service) platform. We do require you to install a plugin to deliver the service to your website and your clients. This plugin allows us to connect our extensive platform with live data feeds and deliver the solution your business needs.

You don’t want your website’s search to look clunky and unprofessional. **We seamlessly add the IDX search and engagement tools with your overall design like it was designed with search from the beginning.**

**You can easily**

*   Add the search anywhere on your site
*   Choose from eight different map styles to personalize your site
*   Add nine different lead capture widgets into your site
*   Use CSS to customize the look and feel
*   Choose to feature agent and/or office listings at the top of the search results
*   Pick from 4 flexible display options for live IDX content, including grid view, list view, scrollable galleries, and auto-rotating slideshow galleries
*   Pick the registration and content locks that work best for you business
*   And more.

Now, **if you want add a new feature, suggest different UX/UI for the plugin, etc, we welcome your ideas as well.** We have created some proprietary features such as the [Friends & Family Search](https://showcaseidx.com/best-practices-for-agents-how-to-get-the-most-out-of-your-friends-family-search-on-your-website/) from ideas within our team but many of our updates over the past year have come from the thousands of agents and brokers that use Showcase IDX to power their websites.

Once you become a Showcaser, you’ll gain access to our private masterclass group and we’ll share with your our ideas board where you can submit your ideas and see/vote on those ideas from other top performing agents.

Simply put, a non-developer can deploy absolutely beautiful IDX search functionality on their site in less than an hour.

I have used many IDX plugins for WordPress, and **nothing comes even close when it comes to simplicity and beautiful appearance**.

![Image 3: Anonymous on WordPress.org](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/tvo-no-photo.png)

Anonymous on WordPress.org

**WOULD YOU BET YOUR BUSINESS ON A IDX SOLUTION?**

I have used a couple different idx solutions in the six years I have been a real estate agent. **Showcase IDX has been easy to use and powerful enough to** write neighborhood blog posts with vague boundaries to precise condo building blog posts.

**Because Nashville Home Guru ranks so high in many different communities they are often surprised we are a team of less than 10 people (including agents)**.

**We effectively compete everyday with Zillow, Trulia and Redfin ... Showcase Idx is critical to our success.** No comparison. Our site stats for Nashville Home Guru are over 12K unique users per week. **That is up significantly from a year ago when we were on Wolfnet Idx.** The support team is very helpful. If you work your website as hard as we do ... it is important for support gets back to your in a timely manner.

![Image 4: Wolfnet IDX review](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Patrick-Higgins.jpg)

Patrick HigginsTeam Leader At Nashville Home Guru

**WHAT I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR ALL ALONG.**

**This is my 3rd IDX, I have used both Diverse Solutions and IhomeFinder. Neither delivered what I wanted**: a simple but awesome user experience that looked great, was easy to use, SEO friendly and fast .

**I found Showcase IDX after lots of research. It met my expectations, and then some.** The **quality of the search compares with the major real estate portal sites**. Since switching to Showcase, **my bounce rate is down 20%, time spent on my site has doubled, and most importantly I am getting 4x more registrations on my site.** Those results speak for themselves.

**Clients and leads love the home search**. It is sleek, very user-friendly and has great mapping features. They can easily ask you as the agent a question from a listing. **They can even add friends and family to their search**, which makes your site sticky**.** Go for the premium content, users love to see the extra charts and data!

Showcase IDX has the others beat. Competition for consumers' attention is intense. **If you do not have the right IDX, people will immediately go to a different site. I find more web traffic returning to my site when I switched to Showcase IDX**. They also are always making improvements to make sure that they stay ahead of the curve.

Showcase IDX has great support. I always use the chat feature online, and I am able to talk to a staff member every time that has answers to my questions within minutes.

![Image 5: Will Rodgers](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Will-Rodgers-Real-Estate-Marketing-Expert.jpeg)

Will RodgersAgent & Web Marketing Expert

**SHOWCASE IDX BRINGS THE LEADS!**

**A large amount of business is generated through our website presence**, which has been a 15+ year ongoing project. Content creation is crucial to drive new organic traffic to the website, and delivering a valuable experience for our online visitors is paramount to me. At the end of the day though, if the IDX is not a rock-solid experience for our visitors, we won't get leads we need. **I am very happy to say Showcase IDX delivers the leads! I am often told by prospects and clients that our website is their favorite in town.**

That makes me proud of the work that was put into it, and gives me the confidence that our search technology is exceeding our online visitors' expectations. Showcase IDX offers features not found in any other IDX. I always look forward to new product offerings, and can't wait to see what is next to allow us to shine online!

I have reached out to support several times, and have always had a good experience with Support requests.

![Image 6: idx seo and lead generation](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Bill-McCue.jpeg)

Bill McCueBroker Associate

**YOUR RETENTION RATE WILL BE MUCH HIGHER**

**No subdomains or Iframes is probably my favorite feature, but at the end of the day it's about Results.** Showcase IDX is the closest thing you're going to get to a custom coded IDX solution for your website. I like that **it just flat out works for agents.**

I think **the biggest thing is how "sticky" their site becomes.** Almost any site can generate leads but those same leads keep searching, with Showcase IDX, **the retention rate is much higher.**

What competition? Seriously, Idxbroker forces you to use subdomains and somewhat wacky javascript "injections" that break the continuity of the site. Zillow owned Dsidxpress was promising years (many years) ago but haven't innovated off their first iteration. ihomefinder is clunky and has poor conversion rates and styling. When I talk to clients about Showcase IDX it's either Showcase or another more custom solution that is 10X the cost!

I've rarely had an issue where I needed support. That's a testament to how intuitive it is. The one time I needed support, I was answered promptly. Yes, I got treated as if I knew nothing and as a developer that annoys me, but the support team walked me through the ENTIRE process to get the problem solved. Thankfully my computer was on when they asked. 😉

![Image 7: Joshua Jarvis](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Joshua-Jarvis.png)

Joshua JarvisOwner, 4rd Marketing

**THE BEST ALL-AROUND IDX FOR REALTORS WANTING RESULTS**

**We were previously using another IDX for our client sites. As a digital agency focused on measurable results, we were frustrated with the limitations we had.** **We started researching alternatives and thank god we found Showcase IDX.**

We believe every Real Estate Agency has unique needs depending on their geographic market, agency size, competitors and budget. Therefore, we shy away from "cookie-cutter" sites and marketing plans and try to provide customizable and scalable solutions. Showcase IDX acts as the foundation of our sites and campaigns. The ease of "Hotsheet" shortcodes and "Customized Searches" allows us to quickly scale and build out landing pages integral to our marketing campaigns. The layout of the property detail page is designed in a way that is conversion-centric. The layout is user-friendly with well placed call-to-action buttons.

Although we haven't evaluated every single IDX out there, we looked at a lot of options. **Once we discovered Showcase IDX and communicated with their team, we knew we did not need to look further.** It aligns with our ethos of providing a great user experience to the end-users.

The team at Showcase IDX have been very great. Fortunately, we have not needed much support. Their interface is **very easy to implement and use.** When we have needed help, they've been very quick to respond and answer our questions. Kurt has also been amazing with providing us with industry insights so that we can provide even more value to the Realtors we work with.

![Image 8: Kevin Alvarez](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Kevin-Alvarez-real-estate-marketing-websites.jpg)

Kevin AlvarezPresident, Blue Lynx Marketing

**HEAD AND SHOULDERS ABOVE THE REST, AND IT'S REALLY NOT EVEN CLOSE.**

Showcase IDX has a number of dynamic features that help make it **the superior WordPress IDX solution for our clients**. Included are a range of registration settings that help maximize lead generation, social login capability for frontend users, customizable SEO settings for listing detail pages, and **a number of slick interactive tools that truly give home buyers a unique search experience**. In addition, Showcase IDX also includes most (if not all) of the MLS fields in any market, which is **a major SEO boost for our clients as website competition gets stronger**.

The flexibility to connect to advanced, third-party CRMs is also a plus, but just having a Showcase IDX account will still provide you with basic lead management tools, like being able to see what listings users are viewing and setting leads up on saved searches just to name a couple.

Over the years, the majority of my clients have been using expensive, all-in-one platforms, so we're only just getting started with Showcase IDX. **We fully expect more of the agents and brokers we work with to love the value and flexibility Showcase IDX provides, especially as results our current users are seeing continue to improve.**

Compared to any other WordPress IDX plugin, Showcase IDX is **head and shoulders above the rest, and it's really not even close.**

Support has been amazing. Tiffany usually responds to any issues the same day I reach out.

![Image 9: Joe Heath](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Joe-Heath-Chicago-Real-Estate-Marketing.jpeg)

Joe HeathMarketing Specialist, Real Estate Web Creation

**AN EASY DECISION FOR REAL ESTATE AGENTS**

Showcase IDX provides a user-friendly search & **powerful lead generation tools that seamlessly integrate into your website**. For agents wanting a state-of-the-art real estate website that **adds REAL VALUE for people in their community, Showcase IDX is an easy decision.**

Showcase IDX's clean, modern, and user-friendly search is unmatched with other IDX plugins.

**Nothing less than 5 STARS working with the support team** at Showcase IDX.

![Image 10: Robert Brock - Owner Web Designer](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/Robert-Brock-Owner-Web-Designer-Brock-Creative-Projects-scaled.jpg)

Robert BrockOwner & Web Designer, Brock Creative Projects

**SHOWCASE IDX ALL DAY EVERYDAY!**

From a developer standpoint it's incredibly easy to setup, and **we're wholly confident recommending it to our clients.** It's great to offer a solution we know our clients will love. More importantly, we know the Showcase IDX team will continue improving their platform and staying on the bleeding edge. That is rare in an industry like real estate that's notoriously slow to embrace change.

I think they're **by far the best IDX solution out there. Forward thinking, always improving, with a clear focus on the interface - one of the major areas other providers fail**. Making sure the application is user-friendly is paramount to success in this space. They were also one of the first to fully embrace WordPress and make listings indexable. **It feels like everyone else is still playing catch-up all these years later.**

Excellent! The team has been very responsive and helpful the few times I've had to reach out.

![Image 11: James Gillentine](https://showcaseidx.com/wp-content/uploads/28south-creative.png)

James GillentineShowcase IDX Certified Partner

 **LOVE THE SIMPLICITY OF USE OF SHOWCASE IDX**

I **switched from IDX Broker** because I liked the look of the results and **wanted to move away from a** sub domain. Creating hotsheets is quick and easy and adding to MY pages and post is as simple as a shortcode. No need to create separate pages and more SEO.

Even though I do not force sign up and never have, **I get more voluntary** sign ups **than I did with old provider.** I think that speaks for itself.

Support is very good, they have only missed a couple of things and that's usually because they are **constantly working on improving their product.** If I don't get a response, all I do is call and they get right on it.

Get started quickly with all the help you need
